name: bootstrap-icons-html
description: Adds <i data-bi="icon-name" (data-bi-width="custom-width" data-bi-height="custom-height")> for Bootstrap Icons alongside window.bootstrapIconsURL for submitting a custom spritesheet URL (defaults to "./bootstrap-icons.svg").
author: Ruben Vergani <me@rubenverg.com> (rubenverg.com)
